name: Vampire Axe
description:
Vampire Axe is a simple top down survivors-like. This is our first ever entry in a Game Jam!

Left Click - to fire Bloodslashes - Careful! They also damage the player!

WASD - To move

Picking up blood drops level the player up and increases the players attack speed.

See how long you can survive!

After death wait a few seconds to be taken back to the title screen.

Rough around the edges as this is mostly a learning project for us. Thank you for looking at our game!

Palette Used: https://lospec.com/palette-list/blood-crow

Credits

Olontora - Artist and Programmer

Discode - Programmer

Silver - Music
